cmdGA

Class MultipleOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmdGA.Option
      • cmdGA.MultipleOption

  • public class MultipleOption
extends Option
    Represents an Option that accepts one o more arguments.
    Author:
    Javier Iserte

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultipleOption

        public MultipleOption(Parser parser,
              java.lang.Object defaultValue,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String alias,
              char separatingChar,
              ParameterType type)
        Create a new MultipleOption parser.
        Parameters:
        parser - An instance of Parser that is linked to the option.
        defaultValue - The default value returned
        name - The string that is used to call this option in the command line.
        alias - An alias for the name.
        type - An instance of ParameterType that represents the type of the value returned.
        separatingChar - Is the char that used to separate the arguments.

      • MultipleOption

        type - An instance of ParameterType that represents the type of the value returned.
